      Fields in org.netbeans.editor declared as PopupManager.Placement 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PopupManager.Placement PopupManager.Above
      Place popup always above cursor
      static PopupManager.Placement PopupManager.AbovePreferred
      Place popup above cursor.
      static PopupManager.Placement PopupManager.Below
      Place popup always below cursor
      static PopupManager.Placement PopupManager.BelowPreferred
      Place popup below cursor.
      static PopupManager.Placement PopupManager.FixedPoint
      Place the popup on a fixed point of the view, measured from top-left corner
      static PopupManager.Placement PopupManager.Largest
      Place popup to larger area.
